artist: Manufacturer: Probably by Chelsea Porcelain Manufactory
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. David Williams and Mr. and Mrs. Charles Spensley from the Estate of Ida B. Williams
description: figurine (man holding basket of fruit), ceramic-porcelain, man offers fruit basket under arm, stands on gold scalloped base, English, XVIIIc NO PHOTO ON CAT. CARDS; cat. card dims H 7-5/8 x W at base 2-7/8'
title: Shepherd figure
